attributes.action: Amend (or scrap) the human rights act NOW or face the same fate as France
attributes.additional_details: If nothing is done to amend or scrap the Human Rights act right NOW, the UK will face the same fate as France and Australia. Islamic terror is on the rise and these people are being protected by The ECHR. They should be excluded if found to be connected directly or indirectly to ANY banned terrorist organisation. If these people go to ground and claim asylum they are protected by this law. STOP IT NOW!
